description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
48 Canonbury Square, N1 2AW

TPO Reference
T2 & T3 (2 x Sycamores) of LBI TPO (No.270) 2006
T4 (False Acacia) of LBI TPO (No.270) 2006
T5 (Sycamore) of LBI TPO (No.270) 2006

PO Number
TO80091

Work specifications
2 x Sycamores (T2 & T3) in the rear garden 48 Canonbury Square
Crown thin re-growth by a maximum of 20%, cut back to clear neighbouring buildings by a maximum of 1m
Remove deadwood

1 x False Acacia (T4) in the front garden of 48 Canonbury Square
Reduce back lateral spread of the tree by a maximum of 25% this should be undertaken by reducing back the length of sub-laterals to a suitable growth point. (THIS IS NOT AN OVERAL CROWN REDUCTION, NO HEIGHT SHALL BE TAKEN OFF THE TREE, NO THINNING OF THE TREE SHALL BE UNDETAKEN EITHER)
Cut back to clear the front elevation of the building by a maximum of 1m
Crown light up to a maximum height of 3.5m
Remove the Ivy from the crown and trunk.
Remove deadwood

1 x Sycamore (T5) in the front garden 48 Canonbury Square
Reduce back lateral spread of the tree over the road by a maximum of 25% this should be undertaken by reducing back the length of sub-laterals to a suitable growth point. (THIS IS NOT AN OVERAL CROWN REDUCTION, NO HEIGHT SHALL BE TAKEN OFF THE TREE, NO THINNING OF THE TREE SHALL BE UNDETAKEN EITHER)
Cut back to clear the front elevation of the building by a maximum of 1m
Cut back to clear street light by a maximum of 1m
Remove deadwood
